modName: Make A Follower Kit Complete Tutorial
summary:
Start to Finish
Learn how to make a Standalone Follower for Legendary Edition
Made with the New Mod Maker in mind.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=6]Bring on the Followers!![/size][/color][/font]
[youtube]xh1puQBsKfE[/youtube][/center]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]This video tutorial is a complete start to finish tutorial and guide on how to create a Standalone Custom Follower using Asherz2Ashes [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76828/?]Make A Follower Kit[/url] including weapons and armor. Also teaches the new modder how to prepare your mod for upload as well as pathing in Nifscope and using Nifmerge in the process.

The [url=http://www.skyrimmods.xyz/p/make-follower-kit-tutorial.html]written tutorial for the MAFK is available HERE   
 [color=#ffffff]Some people may, however, find a video tutorial more helpful (I know I do) This is for them.[/color]
[/url]
To My knowledge the MAFK is not compatible with Special Edition, and this tutorial was made using Legendary Edition. Consult with Asherz2Ashes on that subject as he would know more about it.

No there isn't a video download here, just the video I posted on [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLtfb3002kIRn6xqP7wRL9Q]My Youtube Channel[/url] just the example ESP with no assets. Download the MAFK to create your own.
Made by TAP Gaming (aka The Mighty Nine) with the explicit permission of Asherz2Ashes.
Reposting of this video anywhere other than on this page without My permission is DENIED (those who already have permission know it in advance)[/size][/font]

Creds & Stuff:
